intro: Citrus medica var. limon, commonly known as the lemon. This variety is a citrus fruit native to Asia and is characterized by its yellow, acidic fruit. The plant is a small evergreen tree with thick, glossy leaves and fragrant white flowers. Its fruit is rich in vitamin C and contains essential oils that contribute to its distinct aroma. The botanical features of Citrus medica var. limon make it a valuable species in both culinary and medicinal applications.
